name: Almond Chia Breakfast Bars
author: David Brieck Jr
summary: Almond meal bars are a healthy addition to breakfast or use as a snack between meals.
ingredients: ½ cup powdered peanut butter (such as PB2®)
directions: Combine 2 cup water, almonds, and 1 pinch salt together in a bowl; let sit for 8 hours to overnight
Blend drained almonds and 2 cups water together in a blender until smooth, about 2 minutes
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spray an 11x15-inch baking dish with cooking spray
Mix flour, chocolate chips, olive oil, chia seeds, honey, powdered peanut butter, cinnamon, vanilla extract, and 2 teaspoons salt into almond mixture until dough is evenly combined
Transfer dough to the prepared baking dish, leveling dough with a fork or spatula
Bake in the preheated oven until cooked through and lightly browned, 30 to 40 minutes
Allow to cool for 10 minutes before cutting into bars
